ygData.subject: Re: spell slots
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I am level 13 so I use 4th cricle spells but what I have is: Whirl Till You Hurl Fear Tashan Chaotic Feedback Choke The last 3 I switch around to fit the
ygData.messageBody:
Well I am level 13 so I use 4th cricle spells but what I have is:
Whirl Till You Hurl
Fear
Tashan
Chaotic Feedback
Choke

The last 3 I switch around to fit the situation.

Soloing:
Gate
Minor Illusion
Pet

With Group:
I try different things including charm tactics.

I rarly ever have buff spells memorized. When my buffs run out I will sit
and memorize them, right now these are the buffs I have on all the time.
Strength
Mist
Lesser Shielding
Serpent Sight



------
When the people we love are stolen from us, the way to have them live on is
to never stop loving them. Buildings burn, people die, but real love is
forever. -- The Crow
